com.foreach.across.core.context.module

Class AcrossModuleBootstrapConfigurationSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.core.context.module.AcrossModuleBootstrapConfigurationSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<AcrossModuleBootstrapConfiguration>

    public class AcrossModuleBootstrapConfigurationSet
extends Object
implements Iterable<AcrossModuleBootstrapConfiguration>
    Converts a set of AcrossModuleDescriptors into the actual AcrossModuleBootstrapConfigurations that should be used to startup the module context. Ensures that extension modules are merged into the first available target configuration.

    Provides direct access to the configuration for a specific module, using getConfigurationForModule(String). This will always return the module specific configuration, even for an extension module. It will also take all module aliases into account as such multiple module names may return the same configuration instance.

    Use getConfigurationsInOrder() for retrieving the ordered list of configurations that should be bootstrapped.

    Since:
    5.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    AcrossModuleDependencySorter

      • create

        public static AcrossModuleBootstrapConfigurationSet create(@NonNull
                                                           @NonNull Collection<AcrossModuleDescriptor> moduleDescriptors)
        Build the collection of AcrossModuleBootstrapConfiguration instances for the specified list of module descriptors. This will convert the descriptors to configuration instances, order and merge the extensions together in order. Extensions will be added to the target module according to their dependency order as well.
        Parameters:
        moduleDescriptors - original set of descriptors
        Returns:
        configuration set
